title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Deck the halls with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set! This set includes a 23.6 inch diameter Christmas door wreath and an 8.8 feet long garland, both adorned with snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and 100 LED warm lights. The lifelike design of these decorations adds a charming touch to your holiday and Christmas atmospheres.

The wreath is battery operated and comes with a convenient timer function. Simply press the on/off button and the wreath will light up, automatically turning on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours every 24 hours. It's powered by 3 AA batteries (not included), making it easy to use and set up.

No assembly is required for these decorations, as the branches are pre-assembled. They are made of sturdy high-quality materials and hypoallergenic fireproof pins, ensuring durability and longevity. You'll save time and effort by not having to buy fresh flowers every week, and these decorations will never fade away.

Our winter wreath and garlands are perfect for both indoor and outdoor use. Hang them on your wall, door, fireplace, living room, bedroom, dining room, or windows to instantly enhance the festive atmosphere in any area of your house. These hanging wreath decorations will bring holiday cheer for years to come.

In the rare event that you receive the branches in a messy state, simply flatten them by hand to achieve the desired effect. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us. We offer a 365-day warranty and 24-hour friendly customer service. Bring joy and beauty to your Christmas decorations with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set!

Introducing our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set! This set includes a 23.6-inch diameter Christmas door wreath and an 8.8-feet long garland, perfect for adding a festive touch to your indoor or outdoor decorations. The wreath and garland feature snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and 100 LED warm lights, creating a charming and lifelike holiday atmosphere. 

Our battery-operated wreath is equipped with 100 LED warm lights and comes with a timer function. Simply press the on/off button, and the wreath will light up and activate the timer, turning on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours every 24 hours. No need to worry about constantly changing batteries! 

With easy assembly and high-quality materials, our wreath and garland are designed to save you time and effort. Made of sturdy materials and hypoallergenic fireproof pins, they are strong and durable, ensuring they will last for years to come. 

Hang these wreaths on your wall, door, fireplace, or any area of your house to instantly add a festive atmosphere. Whether it's in your living room, bedroom, dining room, or windows, these decorations will bring holiday cheer to your home. 

If you have any questions or concerns, our friendly customer service team is available 24/7. We also offer a 365-day warranty, so you can purchase with confidence. Don't miss out on this perfect Christmas decoration set – order yours today!

🎄 Bring the holiday spirit to your home with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set! This set includes a 23.6 inch diameter Christmas wreath and an 8.8 feet long garland, adorned with snowflake pine needle branches, pine cones, berry clusters, and 100 LED warm lights. 

🎄 With the battery operated wreath, you can easily hang it anywhere without worrying about power outlets. Simply insert 3 AA batteries (not included), press the on/off button, and watch as the wreath lights up. The timer function automatically turns the lights on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours every 24 hours. 

🎄 No need to waste time and effort on assembly - our wreath and garland come pre-assembled. Made of high quality materials, they are strong, durable, and hypoallergenic. Enjoy the beauty of these decorations without the hassle of maintenance or fading.

🎄 Perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, you can hang the wreath and garland on your wall, door, fireplace, or any area of your house to create a festive atmosphere. These decorations will bring holiday cheer for years to come.

🎄 We are committed to your satisfaction. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us. We offer a 365-day warranty and 24-hour friendly customer service. Add our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set to your cart now and make your holiday season merry and bright!

🎄Get into the holiday spirit with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set! This set includes a 23.6 inch diameter wreath and an 8.8 feet long garland, featuring snowflake pine needle branches, pine cones, berry clusters, and 100 LED warm lights.🎅

🎄The wreath is battery operated with a convenient timer function. Simply press the on/off button, and the wreath will automatically light up for 6 hours and then turn off for 18 hours every 24 hours. It's powered by 3 AA batteries (not included), making it easy to hang anywhere without the need for an outlet.🕯️

🎄No hassle or assembly required! The branches come pre-assembled, and the wreath is made of sturdy high-quality materials with hypoallergenic fireproof pins, ensuring durability and a long-lasting festive display. Plus, it never fades, saving you time and effort of buying fresh flowers every week.💐

🎄Perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, this wreath and garland set can be hung on walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows. Create a warm and inviting atmosphere in any area of your home.✨

🎄If you receive the product with messy branches, simply flatten them by hand for the desired effect. We also offer exceptional after-sales service, with a 365-day warranty and 24-hour friendly customer support.🎁

🎄Don't miss out on this charming and lifelike Christmas decoration! Order your Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set today and bring holiday cheer for years to come.🎉

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---
